xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/1016148-Chilli and Banana 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/grS7mXBjLdDUBIHbYAQgcIjZtUB.jpg Do-jin is a poor self-employed man who acts as an errand boy for his big brothers. He falls in love with Eun-ha at first sight when he first saw her at the camping site where he went to play with his seniors. Do-jin gets a part-time job as a massage therapist to pay the overdue rent. On the day he visited the mansion, Dojin found out that Eun-ha is living with a foreign professor. Eun-ha sends a signal to rescue her from being secretly held as a sex slave. Chilli and Banana
